pullRequest.title: pause button for autos
pullRequest.bodyText:
show pause button, thanks to this question will fix #4531
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/29022062/mediasession-stop-button-vs-pause-button-displayed

commit.message: only show the play button for non-car mode, since that is taken care of already

nodes.bodyText: @ByteHamster by default Android Autos has play, so no need to add to that
Putting this into the else block, I saw duplicate rewind and fast forward on Autos
